text: ahō dāvūd! api oba mahapoḷovē niyōjitayaku bavaṭa pat kaḷemu. eheyin oba janayā atara yuktigaruka va tīndu denu. tavada āśāvan anugamanaya nokaranu. eviṭa eya allāhgē mārgayen oba nomaga yavanu æta. niyata vaśayenma allāhgē mārgayen nomaga giyavun vana ovunaṭa viniścaya dinaya ovun amataka kaḷa bævin dæḍi dan̆ḍuvamak æta
